transcript: on November 30th of 2022 the world changed forever artificial general intelligence or AGI became accessible to the public for free through a tool called chat gbt and it went from zero to a million users in five days which is the fastest any platform has gone to a million users took Instagram two years it took Facebook 10 months took Pinterest four months and it took Angry Birds 35 days nothing has ever happened like this in the past I think that it has the potential to unravel the very fabric of capitalism itself and what it means for us as individuals
